news.heading: Edinburgh International Film Festival
news.content:
I'm attending the EIFF 2015 as an industry delegate. I'll be co-hosting a series of podcasts reviewing the films the EIFF 2015 has to offer and we'll be chatting to industry guests about their film-making experiences.
Check out our facebook page at Film Club sc and if you are here as well please come and say hello.
